title: following provisions of the Defence (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 25 of 2024)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Defence (Amendment) Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Defence (Amendment) Act 2024 

(Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited defence (amendment) act 2024 (commencement certain provisions) order 2024

title: following provisions of the Defence (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 25 of 2024)
heading: 2. The 6th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 6th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Defence (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 25 of 2024) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 5; 

(b) 

section 13; 

(c) 

section 16; 

(d) 

section 19; 

(e) 

(f) 

section 21; 

section 22; 

(g) 

section 23. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 November, 2024. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 
Minister for Defence. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [609] 3
